name: Data Lost Around The Sun
description:
Computer malfunction sends you way off your orbit into the depths of the Solar System. You're left on your own with a sole companion, a cat named Data.

The computer managing the station cannot be trusted, so you'll have to tend to all systems. Day after day you'll have to arrange the solar panels, check life support system connections, rearrange lighting in botanics and tweak feeding tubes in a meat growing lab. Your only joy will be times spent playing with Data.

You'll have to be down-to-earth to safely get back down to earth.

This is a small pixel-art puzzle game created for EPIC MegaJam 2019 

We hope you would like it! :)

Would you like to know more?

Visit our website: http://loonyware.com/

or Twitter: https://twitter.com/loonyware

Controls: mouse (point&click style)
